remarks:
` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)

 ` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof by Jim Kingdon, 16-Dec-2017.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hbs1 $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. x [ y / x ] ph ) $.
$d x y $.
